Title: Populate K8s Secrets (dev)
Body: Create Secret maestro-secrets in maestro-system with: POSTGRES_URL, REDIS_URL, JWT_SECRET, SESSION_SECRET, AUTH0_*, AZURE_*, GOOGLE_*, BASE_URL, OTEL_EXPORTER_OTLP_ENDPOINT. Create PD key in monitoring.

Title: Populate K8s Secrets (build)
Body: Same as dev but for build namespace; ensure BASE_URL points to build URL.

Title: Create/Update ConfigMap
Body: Apply deploy/maestro/configmap.yaml with LOG_LEVEL, FEATURE_FLAGS, PUBLIC_URL.

Title: Verify Argo Rollouts Installed
Body: Install CRDs/controller and kubectl-argo-rollouts plugin; confirm version.

Title: Verify OTEL Collector
Body: OTLP endpoint reachable from cluster; set OTEL_EXPORTER_OTLP_ENDPOINT env.

Title: Deploy Canary (dev)
Body: Apply deploy/argo/rollout-maestro.yaml, set image to sha-${GITHUB_SHA}; watch canary.

Title: CI/CD Secrets & Vars
Body: Set PAGERDUTY_ROUTING_KEY, COSIGN_EXPERIMENTAL=true, registry vars, OIDC creds.

Title: Pipeline Order Verified
Body: Build → tests → SBOM → cosign sign → push → deploy(dev).

Title: Branch Protection
Body: Require checks: unit, e2e, sbom, sign, vuln scan.

Title: Argo Analysis Gating
Body: Prometheus queries for p95 and 5xx rate used for canary gating.

Title: Dashboards Imported
Body: Grafana dashboards (service overview, rollout, error budget) imported.

Title: PagerDuty Routing Test
Body: Trigger test alert via Alertmanager API; validate incident in PD.

Title: Synthetic + E2E Green
Body: Smoke script hits /healthz,/readyz and a happy-path workflow; CI job runs same.

Title: Runbooks R1–R5 Checked In
Body: Rollback/Abort, DB migration roll-fwd/back, OIDC rotation, On-call triage, Canary tuning.

Title: DR & Retention
Body: Backup schedule set; scripts/dr/restore_check.sh passes; retention SQL scheduled.
